Chubby physics himbo. Grad student at National Taiwan Normal University.

He is an office worker who lives in Tokyo, Japan.
He graduated from a music college outside of Tokyo and majored in new media art at a graduate school in Gifu, Japan. He worked part-time for about nine months for a porn screening organization as a cyber-patroller to remove pirated pornography. During his time there, he realized the strength of his own ADHD disability, which motivated him to search for employment opportunities for disabled people.
Currently, he is working for a software engineering company in Tokyo.

Freenet / Hyphanet is a peer-to-peer platform for censorship-resistant and privacy-respecting publishing and communication.

A technical pillar to protect freedom of communication against threats of direct censorship, punishment, or harassment.

Brit. I've lived in Germany about 10 years now. Software developer. Plants, particularly #permaculture & regenerative agriculture (little practical experience alas, due to being restricted to a balcony - until recently. Hurray!), #reading, casual running, casual #biking, environmental stuff in general. I'm here to #chill, I'll try to leave the politics and doom to the other account. Nice to meetcha.

Photo is of purple sprouting broccoli I grew/that grew. I don't remember planting it.

A traveller in love with the chaos and wonder of life, and an interest in many things, particularly geo-politics. #socialjustice for all. #antiwar #antiimperialism . Those who blindly follow Western propaganda narratives are requested to stay away, as I prefer to deal with people of at least some intellect, even when we disagree. Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
